project.name: Eve Backend Schema's OID Registry Implementation
project.shortDescription: Eve Backend Schema's OID Registry Implementation
project.description: Eve's backend subsystem contains several components to manage schema objects. One of those components is a name to OID registry for all schema entities. The registry is responsible for adding new names to an OID as well as enabling the lookup of primary and auxillary names for schema objects with IANA assigned OID numbers. This project contains the default OidRegistry implementation used.
